<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Festering Wound](/Feats.aspx?ID=3566) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Disease" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=46" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 61</row>

**Archetype** [Zombie](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=182)

**Prerequisites**
[Zombie Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3557)

</column>

---

Wounds you inflict with your [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attacks fester and rot, becoming infected and difficult to heal. The DC to [Treat these Wounds](/Actions.aspx?ID=57) using [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) increases by 5, and magically or alchemically healing these wounds requires a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. Succeeding at any of these removes the disease. The effect also ends if the creature is healed to full Hit Points by any means.
name: Festering Wound
